item.title: DemoteDonator Command HELP?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

Hey Moparscape I Am Looking For A Command That Can Demote A Donator… So I Don’t Got To Go into Source Each time Just To Demote… Please Help!
BELOW IS MY IDEA OF THE COMMAND BUT IT DIDN’T WORK! 317, Delta

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“demoteDonar”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hollowfied”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

	c.donator = 0;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    }

[/code]

Read full topic
